title: "Grafana Adds Outlier Detection to Its Machine Learning Toolkit"
excerpt: "Grafana has released outlier detection as part of their Grafana Machine Learning toolkit. Outlier detection can be used to monitor a group of similar things and be alerted when some of them start to behave differently than the norm."
